name: Richard Mille's Newest Million-Dollar-Plus RM056 Sapphire Crystal Case Watch For Felipe Massa
description: In 2005, Richard Mille was an extremely young luxury watch brand, but very much one that displayed immense promise given the competitive atmosphere. Aiming for ultra complexity and a close synergy with the world of high performance racing machines, Richard Mille was quick to become the leader of ultra-luxury sports watches
